@mickyfinny
alright mickyfinny
almost done, just need your help with one thing

i read the instructions, and copied the "AirbusNewHUD.dll" to my "Addon Modules" folder,located in my main FSX folder.

however, the other part i'm too dumb to understand it. 

I made a backup of "A330NightPanel_feelThere.dll", BUT, the other part was unclear. There's a bunch of stuff to write, could you please enlighten me how to do it?
Please?

@suitretas Important Make a backup of your dll.xml !!(in case you make a mistake)Mine is located at C:\Users\mickyfinny\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\FSX (Win7)or do a search if your o/s is different.Open the dll.xml with notepad,copy and paste the lines ive upped into it near the end inbetween  and 
Now that you have done that you need to edit one line : D:\FSX\Gauges\A330NightPanel_feelThere.dll
And change it to whatever path your FSX/GAUGES folder is.As you can see mine is at 
D:\FSX\Gauges\A330NightPanel_feelThere.dll
I hope this helps,if not write back cos i know you have been waiting for this one
try again-near the end inbetween:Launch.Addon and SimBase.Document

However, I now need the Lufthansa livery for the A330 (for A340 it is available at Wilco). Could not find it anywhere. Any hints?

Hello everyone,

An easy way to get everything working:

1) Download this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4320606/FSX_Wilco_Airbus_Series_V._2_-_1g_Installer_(B-H)

2) Then download this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6743066/wilco_evolution_vol2_RIP.rar

3) Install the Airbus vol 2 with the installer [first torrent] and then replace all the equivalent files from the second torrent.

4) After that download this fix:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6743066/wilco_evolution_vol2_RIP.rar

5) And implement the fix by reading the instructions carefully. NOTE: If you don't have the 'Addons Modules' folder in FSX, then create it.

6) Download and install the latest airac cycle [select only which you want to download]:
https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6693463/

7) Enjoy!!!

Great job mickyfinny, grandfred20, imr147 and bonehunter!
